dc:title: Of Finances and Personal Initiative
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Explains the C.W.'s perpetual necessity to help the poor. Objects when states responsibility impedes personal responsibility. Calls her readers to have a Christ room in their homes, hospices in poor parishes and coffee lines for the transients, in order to exercise personal responsibility.
